description: Updates the configurable settings for the specified directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the directory for which to update settings.

parameters.name: Settings
parameters.description: The list of  Setting objects. (dict) --- Contains information about the configurable settings for a directory. The name of the directory setting. For example: TLS_1_0 The value of the directory setting for which to retrieve information. For example, for TLS_1_0, the valid values are: Enable and Disable.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the directory setting. For example: TLS_1_0

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the directory setting for which to retrieve information. For example, for TLS_1_0, the valid values are: Enable and Disable.
